main_tasks:
• Define and design software functionalities to meet customers' business requirements.
• Manage software development projects to create Gauss Labs' industrial AI software products.
• Plan a project with cost estimation, essential tasks, milestones, and success criteria.
Manage project members from multifunctional teams to deliver the project's goal.
• Communicate with various stakeholders and customers at global sites.
• Write technical documents for regular project reviews and business meetings.
• Define business requirements to create software specifications and architecture.
requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in computer science or related field
• +4 years of experience as a software developer and technical lead
• +3 years of experience in software project management
• Expertise in software development tools such as Jira, or Azure DevOps.
• Expertise in software architecture, database, ML DevOps, SaaS, cloud, and machine learning frameworks
• Excellent technical writing and presentation skills in both Korean and English
jd:
As a Senior Software Program Manager, you will lead software projects to build reliable, robust, and scalable AI solutions for the most challenging and fundamental problems the industry faces. You will support Gauss Labs' mission to be the world's most trusted industrial AI innovator. If you are the ideal candidate, you must possess strong project management skills in software development with years of experience as a software developer. The candidate should lead the team to launch marketable software products and services to meet customers' business and technical requirements. To overcome business and technical challenges, you have to plan the AI software development project strategically and manage the team to deliver outstanding performance. You will be required to communicate with various stakeholders at global sites, including Gauss Labs' executives and customers professionally.


주요업무
• Define and design software functionalities to meet customers' business requirements.
• Manage software development projects to create Gauss Labs' industrial AI software products.
• Plan a project with cost estimation, essential tasks, milestones, and success criteria.
Manage project members from multifunctional teams to deliver the project's goal.
• Communicate with various stakeholders and customers at global sites.
• Write technical documents for regular project reviews and business meetings.
• Define business requirements to create software specifications and architecture.

자격요건
• Bachelor's degree in computer science or related field
• +4 years of experience as a software developer and technical lead
• +3 years of experience in software project management
• Expertise in software development tools such as Jira, or Azure DevOps.
• Expertise in software architecture, database, ML DevOps, SaaS, cloud, and machine learning frameworks
• Excellent technical writing and presentation skills in both Korean and English

우대사항
• Master’s or Ph.D. degree in computer science or related field
• +10 years of experience as a software developer, project manager, software architect, and technical lead
• Expertise in software product management and software product releases
• Experience in managing international teams, including outsourcing companies
• Experience in B2B software development in the field of manufacturing and machine learning is a strong plus

혜택 및 복지
가우스랩스는 Gaussian의 지속적인 성장을 응원합니다. 
• 자기계발비 연 200만원 지급.
• 온/오프라인 교육, 세미나 무제한 지원.
• Books of the Months: 선정된 도서 전원 지급, 누구나/어떤 분야든 제안 가능.

가우스랩스는 Gaussian의 건강한 삶을 지원합니다.
• 인당 50만원 상당의 건강검진 지원 (본인 포함 총 2인까지).
• 본인 외 가족구성원 포함 단체상해보험 가입. 
• 휴양지 임직원 할인. 

가우스랩스는 Gaussian의 쾌적한 업무 환경을 마련합니다.
• 신뢰에 기반한 재량근로제. 가장 좋은 성과를 낼 수 있다면 시간과 장소는 자유! 
• 업무 최적 장비 구비.
• 식비, 교통비 및 통신비(직무에 따라) 지원.

더 좋은 복지를 위해 가우스랩스는 계속 변화중입니다.
